user_story: As a new hire, I want to complete and submit all my required paperwork digitally so that I can finish my pre-start tasks efficiently from anywhere.
acceptance_criteria: I can view a list of all required documents and their status (e.g., Not Started, Complete).
I can upload files or fill out and digitally sign forms directly in the tool.
The system confirms when all paperwork has been successfully submitted.

user_story: As an HR specialist, I want to track the paperwork submission status for all new hires so that I can ensure compliance before their start date.
acceptance_criteria: The dashboard shows a list of new hires and their paperwork status (Incomplete, Submitted, Approved).
I can filter the list by start date, department, or manager.
I can send a reminder notification to a new hire with incomplete paperwork.

user_story: As a new hire, I want a clear, personalized 90-day plan with milestones so that I understand what is expected of me and how to succeed in my new role.
acceptance_criteria: The plan is broken down into 30, 60, and 90-day phases.
Each task or milestone can be marked as complete.
I can view resources or contacts linked to specific tasks.

user_story: As a hiring manager, I want to customize a 90-day onboarding plan from a template so that I can provide role-specific guidance for my new hire.
acceptance_criteria: I can select a role-based template to start the plan.
I can add, edit, or remove tasks and milestones from the template.
The plan is automatically shared with my new hire upon their start date.

user_story: As a new hire, I want a step-by-step guide for setting up my accounts and hardware so that I can become productive as quickly as possible.
acceptance_criteria: The guide lists all required systems with links to access them.
Each step includes clear instructions and expected outcomes.
I can check off each setup task as I complete it.

user_story: As a new hire, I want a central place to access and complete all my mandatory compliance training so that I can meet company requirements on time.
acceptance_criteria: The hub displays a list of all assigned training modules.
Each module shows a due date and its completion status.
Upon completing a module, my training record is automatically updated.

user_story: As a hiring manager, I want to collaboratively set and track 30-60-90 day goals with my new hire so that we have a shared understanding of success.
acceptance_criteria: I can propose goals for my new hire within the module.
The new hire can comment on or suggest edits to the proposed goals.
I can mark goals as 'Approved' once we have aligned.

user_story: As an HR specialist, I want to view an analytics dashboard on onboarding progress across the company so that I can identify bottlenecks and improve the overall program.
acceptance_criteria: The dashboard displays key metrics like average time-to-complete for key tasks.
I can filter data by department, role, or hiring manager.
The dashboard highlights new hires who are falling behind on their plan.

user_story: As a new hire, I want to receive timely notifications about upcoming deadlines or new tasks so that I can stay on track with my onboarding.
acceptance_criteria: I receive a notification 24 hours before a task is due.
I receive a notification when my manager adds a new item to my plan.
I can manage my notification preferences (e.g., email, in-app).

user_story: As a new hire, I want a clear agenda for my first week so that I know where I need to be and who I'll be meeting.
acceptance_criteria: The agenda is displayed in a calendar or timeline view.
Each event includes the time, location (or video link), and attendees.
I can add the agenda to my personal work calendar (e.g., Google Calendar, Outlook).

user_story: As a new hire, I want an interactive guide to key people in the organization so that I can understand who to contact for different needs.
acceptance_criteria: The navigator shows my direct team, key cross-functional partners, and leadership.
Each person's profile includes their photo, role, and a brief 'what I do' description.
I can click a profile to see their position in the org chart.

user_story: As a new hire, I want to be automatically matched with an onboarding 'buddy' so that I have a friendly point of contact for informal questions.
acceptance_criteria: I receive an introduction to my buddy via the tool on my first day.
The introduction includes my buddy's contact information and some fun facts.
The system suggests a first coffee chat or meeting.

user_story: As a hiring manager, I want a reminder before my new hire's start date to prepare their welcome experience so that they feel expected and valued from day one.
acceptance_criteria: A notification is sent to me 3 days before the new hire's start date.
The notification includes a checklist of suggested prep tasks (e.g., schedule 1:1, prepare welcome kit).
I can mark the tasks as complete directly from the notification.

user_story: As a new hire, I want access to a curated knowledge base for my specific role so that I can find relevant documents and best practices independently.
acceptance_criteria: The knowledge base is searchable by keyword.
Content is organized by topics relevant to my role (e.g., 'Codebase Overview', 'Sales Playbook').
I can bookmark articles for quick access later.

user_story: As a hiring manager, I want to receive automated prompts to schedule check-ins with my new hire so that I can provide consistent support and feedback.
acceptance_criteria: The system prompts me to schedule check-ins at the 1-week, 30-day, 60-day, and 90-day marks.
Each prompt includes a link to the new hire's progress and suggested talking points.
The system recognizes if a check-in is already on our calendars and does not send a redundant prompt.

user_story: As a new hire, I want to access my onboarding plan on my mobile device so that I can check tasks and my schedule on the go.
acceptance_criteria: All core features are usable on a standard mobile browser (Chrome, Safari).
Text is readable and buttons are tappable without needing to zoom.
Navigation is adapted for a small screen (e.g., hamburger menu).
